column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Quality deep dish pizza. My husband and I went around 6 p.m. on Saturday night and it was already getting crowded. We were lucky to get a table for two outside pretty quickly
column2: but by the time that we were done with our meal
column3: there was a line down the block and the wait for a table was nearly an hour. For those waiting
column5: the hostesses were very organized and even allowed tables to place their orders before getting seated. Once we were seated
column6: the pizza took about forty minutes
column7: but our waitress was honest about the cooking time
column8: and we were able to enjoy the spinach salad while our pizza cooked.
